title: Fort Bowie National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons        Fort Bowie Visitor Center    Â    New! Visitor Center Hours, Summer 2016: The visitor center is open Wednesday through Sunday (closed Monday and Tuesday), from 8 am to 4 pm Mountain Standard Time (MST). Please keep in mind that most of Arizona does not observe Daylight Saving Time. This is especially relevant to park visitors traveling from New Mexico to the park.  Park is open Thanksgiving Day, but closed on Christmas Day, December 25.  Ruins Trail: Ruins Trail hours are from sunrise to sunset.  Peak season is from March until May.
